111.name: Let's Spar
111.desc: "Wow! It's been a long time since I've met an adventurer as powerful as you. Come have a match-up with me!"
tip: Did a crocodile just come flying out from the sea?! It nearly gave me a heart attack!

112.name: A Familiar Feeling
112.desc: "Where did this impetuous adventurer come from? Don't you know that it's dangerous to wander in uninhabited waters like this? Let me teach you some rules for survival here!"
tip: Such a serious and familiar tone...

113.name: Tummy Growling
113.desc: "I'm so hungry... There's less and less food here. Would you help me hunt for some food?"
tip: Does hunger happen in the seas, too?

114.name: Girl in Trouble
114.desc: "O mighty adventurer, my home has been intruded upon by bandits who have come out of nowhere. Would you help evict them from my home?"
tip: She finally know what it feels like to be saved by the hero!

115.name: Where to Go
115.desc: "Why am I here? I don't know... Wow, a lot of bad guys suddenly appeared on the way home. Would you drive them away and take me home?"
tip: Hey... Don't stray too far from home now, good child.

121.name: Fishing Rod Test
121.desc: "The adventurer over there! Yes, you. Would you help me test this fishing rod? I need data from it to create an effective response strategy. You'll get a reward after the task is completed."
tip: A fish fishing... What a novel experience!

131.name: Not a Simple Game
131.desc: "Hey, brave adventurer... Which pearl did you drop, the pink one, the white one, or the black one? Heh heh... How about playing a little game? I'll give it to you if you win."
tip: Heh, today's been a really fruitful day!
Let's leave the bad luck behind here. That should ensure that the rest of the journey will be smooth!

141.name: Maritime Trade
141.desc: "What I bring to you, and the value you can bring me, should satisfy both you and me."
tip: So, was that a good deal or a bad one...?

151.name: With All Sincerity
151.desc: "Are you the adventurer that my friends have been talking about? I thought I might meet you, which is why I've specially prepared a gift for you and have been carrying it on me."
tip: Captain Skadi will place this gift in the center of the table, inside the captain's cabin!

161.name: A Fabulous Encounter
161.desc: "Oh? Are you the adventurer they talk about? You don't look anything special... I am the Auau fish, the greatest in these uninhabited seas."
tip: I keep feeling like something terrible would've happened if I hadn't answered properly just now...
